description:
Ever since their father died, Ichirou Kuga has struggled to support his two younger siblings on nothing but a small inheritance and his passion for drawing manga. But it’s becoming harder to keep up with his growing responsibilities and deadlines, especially after his last two assistants quit to follow their dreams.

Just as he’s nearing his breaking point, the beautiful and scarily competent Shiori Goshiki applies to become his new assistant. But there’s something almost otherworldly about Goshiki, and soon Kuga finds his reality turned upside down when she suddenly declares them engaged to marry!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Drawing
tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/SyllaAria) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@SyllaAria/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/syllaariavtuber/) | [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/syllaaria)

They are married to fellow voice actor [Alejandro Saab](https://anilist.co/staff/120666/Alejandro-Saab).

Filipe is a Brazillian actor and dubber.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/fiteofilo) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/fiteofilo/)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/cocoa2448)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/takatsuguw)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIHIFDHvA6loFvr1GwxCITA/videos)__

__Birthplace:__ Sakura City, Chiba Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Meguro City, Tokyo, Japan

__Takatsugu Wakabayashi__ is a Japanese composer and arranger, who mainly composes music for the game industry.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [painter](https://anilist.co/staff/134252/)._
